title: Scientific Data Analysis Problem-Solving Project Utilizing the BLAST Tool

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic biology and statistics, including understanding of DNA sequencing concepts
context.additional_context: A course focused on training pre-service/in-service teachers in proper use of the BLAST tool and scientific error analysis. Designs smartphone-based learning activities in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain situation-specific selection criteria for BLAST programs (e.g., blastn, blastp)
Through case analysis, learners can quantitatively assess how BLAST parameter adjustments impact result interpretation
Via team projects, learners can analyze/validate DNA sequence manipulation cases using BLAST, identify scientific errors, and produce reports

resources: Virtual Dinosaur Genetic Manipulation Case Study Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
